Statute.Title: Canada — United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord de continuité commerciale Canada — Royaume-Uni, Loi de la mise en oeuvre de l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2021, c. 1, s. 51 in force on assent 17.03.2021

Item.Text: — ss. 1 to 50 in force 01.04.2021 see SI/2021-14, except,
— s. 9(3), par. 12(1)(a) and 14(a) and s. 30, come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, see s. 52(2) — Not in force
